It is composed of a reasonablylarge number of `packages`_ that implement tools for image, audio & videoprocessing, machine learning & pattern recognition, and a lot more taskspecific packages.**Please visit our** `website`_ **for more information.**For the maintainers===================Below are some instructions for the maintainers of the package.Adding/Removing a dependency package------------------------------------The list of bob packages here should be in sync with bob.nightlies.You may use the `bdt gitlab update-bob` command for automatic update of the list ofpackages.Releasing a new version of Bob------------------------------See bob.devtools documentation...
